title: The holy trinity of fucked by the LCS
body:
{{champion:421}} :is still being gutted into the ground as her solo Q and normal play win rate slowly dips more and more,the LCS will cause even more future nerfs

{{champion:429}} :Kalista also requires coordination with her support,and what does the LCS have?bingo bango coordination

Atleast these 2 are still even being played but...

{{champion:268}} :Gutted so hard even pro's won't touch him

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Derpyon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ML9cEyRw,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-18T12:13:27.840+0000) 
> {{champion:429}} 

good riddance.

she wasnt fucked by the lcs, but by her own shitty design. she was broken in solo que and pro play.
Azir was oppresive in SQ/DQ aswell. i didnt want him gutted tho :( just as i started becoming really strong with him BAM nerfed to the ground

> Azir was oppresive in SQ/DQ aswell.

Came here to say this.
But instead of nerfing what makes him super oppresive (Q) range, they nerf other things, bad way to go.

> [{quoted}](name=dominusx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ML9cEyRw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-18T12:17:15.066+0000)
>
> Azir was oppresive in SQ/DQ aswell. i didnt want him gutted tho :( just as i started becoming really strong with him BAM nerfed to the ground

Azir wasn't opressive.

Nah i just W Q hit him twice and he lost half his health while i took like 90 wave dmg. I love azir as a champ but i know when a champ is oppresive you would have a slow early and once you made ur 1st back to get {{item:3101}} you would make people ragequit. {{item:1056}} {{item:1056}} {{item:3101}} {{item:1001}}  this was all you needed for a godlike lane phase i was beating people with triple my games on mid just because how easily i could trade on a safe distance

> [{quoted}](name=dominusx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ML9cEyRw,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-08-18T15:23:42.437+0000)
>
> Nah i just W Q hit him twice and he lost half his health while i took like 90 wave dmg. I love azir as a champ but i know when a champ is oppresive you would have a slow early and once you made ur 1st back to get {{item:3101}} you would make people ragequit. {{item:1056}} {{item:1056}} {{item:3101}} {{item:1001}}  this was all you needed for a godlike lane phase i was beating people with triple my games on mid just because how easily i could trade on a safe distance

Because he is DPS mage you should avoid from his soldiers.Meanwhile your excuse isn't convincing.Azir can make that damage in three seconds.Also Stinger was nerfed before last Azir nerf.New excuse please.Azir wasn't oppressive before last nerf.He was oppressive before 6.11 nerf but he wasn't oppressive before 6.14 nerf

yeh its so easy to get zoned under your turret when he is pretty much in the middle of the lane. or dodge the Q and even if u dodged it he could still proc thunderlord with the attackspeed runes+ stinger. i'm talking about the {{item:3116}} {{item:3115}} azir dunno which patch was it and idc i played him i know what i did i know how i laned and how annoyng i was i aint gotta prove anything to you lmao

> [{quoted}](name=dominusx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ML9cEyRw,comment-id=00010001000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-18T15:32:52.254+0000)
>
> yeh its so easy to get zoned under your turret when he is pretty much in the middle of the lane. or dodge the Q and even if u dodged it he could still proc thunderlord with the attackspeed runes+ stinger. i'm talking about the {{item:3116}} {{item:3115}} azir dunno which patch was it and idc i played him i know what i did i know how i laned and how annoyng i was i aint gotta prove anything to you lmao

You can say Rylai was oppressive but you can not say Azir was oppressive.Your problem is with Rylai, not with Azir.Same problem valid for Cassiopeia.You can take MR runes.Rune isn't excuse for me.There are solutions of problems.I hope you know Azir's mana problems in early game.Moreover Cassiopeia hasn't mana problems.Her E gives free minion and free mana.

> [{quoted}](name=dominusx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ML9cEyRw,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-08-18T15:23:42.437+0000)
>
> Nah i just W Q hit him twice and he lost half his health while i took like 90 wave dmg. I love azir as a champ but i know when a champ is oppresive you would have a slow early and once you made ur 1st back to get {{item:3101}} you would make people ragequit. {{item:1056}} {{item:1056}} {{item:3101}} {{item:1001}}  this was all you needed for a godlike lane phase i was beating people with triple my games on mid just because how easily i could trade on a safe distance

By the way I'm looking Azir's soloq stats.His pick rate was 10% before last nerf.Pick rate was 30%.He is frustrating champion maybe for somebody but he isn't oppressive.
not as oppressive outside of pro play but it was still pretty bad yeah

No no no, that's not the holy trinity.

{{champion:59}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:64}} are the holy trinity of the jungle from back in S4.

Anything else is a fake.

> [{quoted}](name=Pojalsta,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ML9cEyRw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-18T12:37:36.128+0000)
>
> No no no, that's not the holy trinity.
> 
> {{champion:59}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:64}} are the holy trinity of the jungle from back in S4.
> 
> Anything else is a fake.

The holy trinity is Lee/Vi/Elise from Season 3. Filthy casual /s
Eh. Not given the name though.
It was just a general term. Your point falls a bit flat. And if you want to get specific, graves/ezreal/Corki were literally called the holy trinity of ADCs a while back.
Well they weren't formally given the name holy trinity as my 3 were.
wasnt udyr nunu and someone else the OG trinity of the jungle? i can't remember atm

then next season
{{champion:59}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:64}} were the only one who could even clear it at 1st ({{champion:19}} was excluded because he wasn't a viable lcs pick)
Season 5 beginning jungle was cancer xD

> [{quoted}](name=Pojalsta,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ML9cEyRw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-18T12:37:36.128+0000)
>
> No no no, that's not the holy trinity.
> 
> {{champion:59}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:64}} are the holy trinity of the jungle from back in S4.
> 
> Anything else is a fake.

It was lee elise khazix in season 4
Nope.
You forgot {{champion:203}}

{{champion:136}}  didn't even make it to LCS, he got nerfed to ground right after release.

And what about {{champion:203}} ?

> [{quoted}](name=ThePikol,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ML9cEyRw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-18T12:17:04.921+0000)
>
> {{champion:136}}  didn't even make it to LCS, he got nerfed to ground right after release.
> 
> And what about {{champion:203}} ?

Kindred still has a decent-isn win rate (al be it not the best)

And aurelion sol was nerfed because he was just flat out to good,because face it,a 2 second stun that can be size of a lane is not balanced
he was played at msi and Immortals picked him once this season.
{{champion:79}}  is next :S
Kalista deserved it a hell of a lot more than the other two ever did.  That mistake can stay down in the dirt where it belongs until it gets a full rework.

Previously known as the holy trinity of fucking the LCS. Those champions need major kit changes to ever find balance, but since they're super new compared to most reworkable champions, they won't get it for quite a while. And, as Riot has previously demonstrated, they would rather have an underpowered champion for a long time than an overpowered champion for a long time.
